name: European Leather Goods Association
goal: The national leather goods federations of Italy (AIMPES), Spain (ASEFMA), Great Britain (BTAA) and France (FFM) have decided to form a European alliance in order to have their voice heard on different subjects of interest in their professional field : leather authenticity, counterfeiting, know-how.
interests: Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
The Alliance is interested in the following EU initiatives:
- Leather authenticity
- Counterfeiting
- Trade
- Know-how promotion
